places_to_visit.name: Haleakala National Park
places_to_visit.description: Haleakala National Park features a massive volcanic crater and stunning sunrise views. Visitors can hike through diverse landscapes and experience breathtaking panoramas.

places_to_visit.name: Road to Hana
places_to_visit.description: The Road to Hana is a scenic drive offering waterfalls, lush rainforests, and coastal views. It's an adventurous journey with many stops for natural attractions.

places_to_visit.name: Lahaina Town
places_to_visit.description: Lahaina is a historic whaling town with a lively waterfront, shops, restaurants, and art galleries. It's a great place to explore local culture and history.

places_to_visit.name: Kaanapali Beach
places_to_visit.description: Kaanapali Beach is a popular resort area with golden sand and clear waters. It's ideal for sunbathing, swimming, and water sports, with many dining options nearby.

places_to_visit.name: Molokini Crater
places_to_visit.description: Molokini Crater is a marine sanctuary known for its snorkeling and diving opportunities. The crescent-shaped reef offers vibrant marine life and clear waters.
